valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Tue 3 Feb 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 4 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: New low expected FitzRoy 975 by midnight tonight. Low Sole 977 expected losing its identity

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 later. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6.
Sea state
In southwest, rough or very rough, occasionally high later. in northeast, moderate or rough.
Weather
In southwest, rain or snow. In northeast, mainly fair.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally very poor. In northeast, good.
